About VisualShape3D¶

VisualShape3D is a simple but growing package for point, line and polygon in 3D space, as well as their relations.

What it can do now :¶

  • Create visible point, line and polygon.

  • Decide their relations, such as inclusion of a 3D point in 3D line/ploygon, and intersection of 3D line with 3D shapes.
